menu.name: Signature Spicy Pasta
menu.description: Fresh handmade pasta tossed in our secret spicy tomato sauce with basil and parmesan.

menu.name: Crispy Calamari
menu.description: Tender lighty fried calamari rings served with lemon aioli and marinara sauce.

menu.name: Truffle Mushroom Risotto
menu.description: Creamy arborio rice with wild mushrooms, truffle oil, and aged parmesan cheese. Creamy arborio rice with wild mushrooms, truffle oil, and aged parmesan cheese. Creamy arborio rice with wild mushrooms, truffle oil, and aged parmesan cheese.

menu.name: Classic Tiramisu
menu.description: Layers of espresso-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream, dusted with cocoa powder.

menu.name: Grilled Salmon
menu.description: Fresh Atlantic salmon fillet grilled to perfection, served with asparagus and lemon butter.

menu.name: Craft Lemonade
menu.description: House-made lemonade with fresh lemons, mint leaves, and a touch of honey.

reviews.author: John D.
reviews.text: Amazing food and great atmosphere! The service was impeccable.

reviews.author: Sarah M.
reviews.text: Really enjoyed my meal here. Will definitely come back.

reviews.author: Mike R.
reviews.text: Best restaurant in town! Highly recommend the signature dishes.

info.name: Tee Cosy
info.description: Experience authentic flavors and exceptional dining in a warm, welcoming atmosphere
